thread.title: Miley Cyrus, George Clooney in New Trailer for Bill Murray's 'Christmas' Special
thread.title_full: Miley Cyrus, George Clooney in New Trailer for Bill Murray's 'Christmas' Special

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Miley Cyrus, George Clooney in New Trailer for Bill Murray's 'Christmas' Special
text:
Comments The new trailer for 'A Very Murray Christmas' is also made merry by Paul Shaffer, Amy Poehler, Michael Cera, Chris Rock, Maya Rudolph, and Jason Schwartzman. 
Bill Murray is celebrating Christmas with his famous guests in a new trailer for his holiday special. The video gives a first look at Miley Cyrus , George Clooney , Paul Shaffer, Amy Poehler , Michael Cera , Chris Rock , Maya Rudolph , and Jason Schwartzman . Set inside New York City's iconic Carlyle hotel, it follows Murray preparing to host a live, international holiday broadcast. After a blizzard shuts down the production, he makes the best of the situation by singing and celebrating with friends, hotel employees and anyone else who drops by. " A Very Murray Christmas " will bring an extra-special dose of holiday cheer to Netflix later this year. Sofia Coppola, who directed Murray in the Oscar-nominated flick " Lost in Translation ", serves behind the lens for this all-star musically-driven holiday special.
